name: @thecapylab/capykit
description: CapyKit is an opinionated Vue Component Library
author: TheCapyLab

scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:update-all && vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:update-all && vitepress build docs
scripts.docs:preview: npm run docs:update-all && vitepress preview docs
scripts.docs:update-all: node docs/build-scripts/update-versions.cjs && node docs/build-scripts/generate-sidebar.cjs && node docs/build-scripts/show-structure.cjs
